Counts the frequency of each letter in a string of text

letter_freq.Rd

Counts the frequency of each letter in a string of text

Usage

letter_freq(text, only_alpha = TRUE)

Arguments

text

A string

only_alpha

TRUE (default) or FALSE. Should only letters be considered? If FALSE, every character is taken into account.

Value

A dataframe with 4 columns. characters contains the characters; total the total number of times the characters appears in the text, scaled is the min-max transform of total and frequencies are the relative frequencies of appearance of each letter.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Create some random string
data("french")
letter_freq(french)
} # }
